response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This unique item holds immense value to us and has been meticulously crafted to cater to high-end needs. Considering its quality and the effort put into it, we're offering it to you at an exclusive price of $15,000. We believe this is a fair offer given the exceptional features and benefits this product provides. Please let us know if you have any questions or need further information to make a decision.", "product_price": 15000}
